column2: What does B say? Which goes with which?
column3:
A: Would you like some coffee?
B: {{c1::No, thanks. I've just had some.}}
column4: No, she's already seen the film. / I don't know. I haven't read it yet. / We haven't told him yet. / He's already left. / Yes, I've just seen her. / No, thanks. I've just had some. / Yes, they've just arrived.
